ABSORB.Definition: take in and understand fully (information, ideas, or experience)

BEG.Definition: ask for, normally as a charity

COLOURFUL.Definition: full of interest; lively and exciting

CONSCIOUS.Definition: (of an action or feeling) deliberate and intentional

HAVE YOU BELIEVE.Definition: want you to think, want you to believe

INHIBITS.Definition: make (someone) self-conscious and unable to act in a relaxed and natural way

NEUROLOGICAL.Definition: relating to the anatomy, functions, and organic disorders of nerves and the nervous system

NUANCED.Definition: characterized by subtle shades of meaning or expression

ON THE FACE OF IT.Definition: without knowing all of the relevant facts; apparently

PORING OVER.Definition: be absorbed in reading or studying (something)

SPONGES.Definition: a soft substance that is full of small holes and can absorb a lot of liquid, and is used for washing and cleaning
